scripts.minify-functions: uglifyjs js/multis/functions.js js/multis/functions.modifiers.js js/multis/functions.layers.js js/multis/functions.layers.data.js js/multis/functions.stacking.js --compress -o build/multis.functions.min.js
scripts.minify-editor: uglifyjs js/editor/canvas.js js/editor/debugger.js js/editor/logger.js js/editor/selector.js --compress -o build/multis.editor.min.js
scripts.minify: npm run minify-functions && npm run minify-operators && npm run minify-editor && npm run minify-core
